alanMistakes: Alan anogona kukanganisa. Shandisa kutonga kwekiriniki.
name: Zita
noCodeLine: Hapana kana kodhi isiriyo? Taura nesu pano
eyeMarqueeLine3: Murume 25 yrs, ziso dzvuku 3 days, anotyira chiedza, kuona kwaderera zvishoma
eyeMarqueeLine5: Congenital cataract inoda kukurumidza kutumirwa here?
eyeMarqueeLine6: Mukadzi 65 yrs, kuona kusina kusimba, haashandise magirazi. Kumberi kwakanaka, lens yakajeka-shoma
eyeMarqueeLine7: Amai vanoshushikana: mucheche ane mboni chena, haoni neziso iroro
earMarqueeLine2: Ndinokwanisa kuona gubhu renzeve neArclight here?
earMarqueeLine3: Mukomana 16 yrs, nzeve inorwadza 2 days, kuzvimba, kunzwa kwakajairika
earMarqueeLine6: Murume 73 yrs, kunzwa kushoma. Chiteshi chenzeve hachioneki zvakanaka, ndinoona wax chete
earMarqueeLine7: Mucheche haapinduri kuruzha, kwapfuura mwedzi yakawanda
geoInfoText: Pakudzvanya “Kuona Nzvimbo” ticha govera lat/long chaiyo kuti tibatsire nemirayiridzo iri nani.
frontOfEyeText:
Enzanisa maziso: akananga, kurudyi, kuruboshwe, kumusoro, pasi.
Svika pedyo ugare wakanyatsotarisa. Tarisa: mapapu eziso, conjunctiva, cornea, pupil.
Shandisa fluorescein kujekesa kukuvara kwecornea
fundalReflexText:
Imba yakaderedza chiedza, mucheche akanyarara; kure kweruoko—enzanisa mwenje unobva.
Fanana: kubwaira, ruvara, chimiro.
Pedyo kuona: maronda, cataract, RB, vit haem
backOfEyeText: Shandisa ziso rerudyi kuona rerudyi remurwere, reboshwe—reboshwe. Murwere tarisa mberi, kwete kuchiedza. Svika pedyo, tsvaga dhisiki reoptic (dilate = kuona kwakanakisa). Tarisa dhisiki: mupendero, ruvara, kapu; tevera miviri mikuru, wodzidzisa murwere kutarisa mwenje kuti uone macula
additionalText_eye:
Dhisiki: rakajairika, rakazvimba, miviri mitsva, kapu yakadzika, rakapfupika
>Dzidzira nguva dzose<
allAroundEarText: Tarisa pinna, tragus, mastoid—kurwadza, kuzvimba kana kutsvedza. Fambisa pinna nyoro wateerera kurwadza
earCanalText: Tsaudza musoro, batira Arclight senge pen. Dhonza pinna kumusoro/nechekuseri (vakuru) kana pasi/nechekuseri (vana). Isa speculum (4.5 mm vakuru, 2.5 mm vana), pfuurira vhudzi, tenderedza kana zvichidiwa. Tarisa: wax, tsvina, hutachiona
tympanicMembraneText: Ziva ruoko rwaMalleus, mwenje unoratidza, neattic. Ongorora: ruvara, chinhanho, kujeka. Tarisa kuboora, mvura kana mavanga
generalObservationText: Tarisa mapundu, shanduko dzemavara, kugoverwa. Kubata nyoro: simba, kupisa, kana kurwadza
uvLightText:
Mumba rine rima, tarisa fluorescence yacho:
tinea (bhuruu-nesvibira), pityriasis versicolor (orenji-copper), erythrasma (coral-red), vitiligo (bhuruu-chena), acne (orenji-tsvuku), nits dzehove (pale-blue)
dermoscopyText: Bata polariser sepen, tarisa ABCDE (kusafanana, mupendero, ruvara, dhayamita >6 mm, kuchinja). Dzidza PDSBV (pigment network, mapoinzi, mitsara, bhuruu-chena, matsinga)
aboutAlanText:
Alan ihungwaru hweAI hunobatsira pakutarisa maziso, nzeve neganda, hunosanganisa mutauro-model neruzivo rwechiratidzo. Hungwaru. Hunoremekedzwa. Hwechizvino-zvino.

Ruzivo rwechiremba, rwenharaunda nemifananidzo zvakagadzirirwa mabasa akaita sevanoshanda vezvehutano nemachiremba. Hurukuro pfupi inoburitsa chirevo nezano rekutarisira. Arclight inoshandiswa muhurongwa hwese.
instructionsIntro: Alan chishandiso chekudzidza cheAI chevadzidzi nevanoongorora nyaya dzemaziso, nzeve kana ganda dzinongoitika nguva nenguva. Nyora pachena uye dzivisa mazita kana ruzivo runozivisa munhu. Tarisa musoro/chiso/chikamu chemuviri zvizere uye ongorora maziso/nzeve mbiri. Rombo rakanaka!
instructionsUseArclight_default: Shandisa Arclight: kumberi, fundal reflex, kumashure kweziso.
instructionsJustRight_eye: Murume 25 yrs, ziso dzvuku 3 days. Hapana mushonga kana nyaya yechikare. Kurwadziwa, maziso anochema, dot chena pa-cornea. Pupil normal, kuona 6/12 & 6/6 kune rimwe.
instructionsTooMuch_eye: Murume akauya nhasi aine maziso matsvuku, achiti chikafu chiri kukanganisa. Maziso anochema, mipendero matsvuku. Anotya cornea & kurwadziwa, achibvunza, “Chii ichi?”
instructionsAdditionalQuery_eye: Mibvunzo: Chii chinonzi iritis? Ndingatarisa sei retina?
instructionsJustRight_ear: Murume 25 yrs, nzeve dzvuku 3 days. Kurwadziwa, kubuda mvura. Gubhu dzvuku, kunzwa kuderera mune imwe nzeve, imwe yakajairika.
instructionsTooMuch_ear: Murume aine nzeve dzvuku, achiti chikafu chiri kukanganisa nzeve. Kubuda mvura, mipendero dzvuku; anotya kunzwa & marwadzo, achiti “Chii ichi?”
instructionsAdditionalQuery_ear: Chii chinonzi otitis media? Ndingachenesa sei nzeve?
instructionsJustRight_skin: Murume 25 yrs, dombo dzvuku paganda 3 days. Ganda rinorwadza, rinokwenya.
instructionsTooMuch_skin: Murume aine ganda dzvuku, achifungidzira chikafu chiri kukanganisa. Ganda rinochema, mipendero matsvuku; anotya pigment & kusvotwa.
instructionsAdditionalQuery_skin: Chii chinonzi eczema? Ndingatarisa sei pigment network?
instructionText: Alan chishandiso chekudzidza cheAI chevadzidzi nevanoongorora nyaya dzemaziso, nzeve kana ganda dzinongoitika nguva nenguva. Nyora pachena uye dzivisa mazita kana ruzivo runozivisa munhu.
